column2: However,  I  need  not venture  into  that  examination  in  view  of the  first  preliminary  objection

column1: that has  been  raised  namely that this application is futile.
This  objection  is  based  on  the  fact  that  the  Board  of Directors  of the  2nd  Respondent,  having

column2: the  recommendation  made  by  the  3rd  Respondent  (Y4)  made  a  determination

column1: accepting the recommendation of the  3rd  Respondent.
The  Petitioner has  failed  to challenge this determination in  this application.  It is  true that when
